data.name: Aussie Battler Tanks
data.detailed_description:
AUSSIE BATTLER TANKS MULTIPLAYER
ENGLISH SPEAKING ONLY.
10 WW2 TANKS, 2 TO 12 PLAYERS WITH HASSLE FREE MULTIPLAYER HOSTING ON CLOUD NETWORK , 3 GAME MODES TDM CTF CP AND 7 MAPS.
PHYSICS TRACKS AND HIT POINTS DAMAGE SYSTEM WITH AP AND HE SHELLS, AND EACH TANK HAS ITS INDERVIUAL ADVANTAGES, LIKE DRIVE SPEED- TURRET TURN SPEED- RELOAD TIME- FIRE POWER- DAMAGE POINTS
FILE SIZE ON DISK AFTER INSTALL IS 5GB.
WINNERS ARE GRINNERS COPY AND SHARE WITH FREINDS IF YOU ARE AUSTRALIAN RESIDENT.

READ ME INFO:
LOWEST PC SPECS - CPU = QUAD CORE 2.6 GHZ, RAM MEMORY = 8 GB,
LOWEST ONBOARD VIDEO = "intel(r) hd graphics 630", WITH AT LEAST 3GHZ QUADCORE CPU IF NO VIDEO CARD.
RECOMEND VIDEO CARDS "NVIDIA GTX 460" "AMD ATI R9 390" "AMD ATI RX 570" OR "NVIDIA GTX 970" WITH 4GB MEM OR BETTER.

3 GAME MODES = TDM-TEAM DEATH MATCH, CTF-CAPTURE THE FLAG, CP-CONTROL POINTS DOMINATION.
7 WW2 MAPS.
10 WW2 TANKS.
2 TO 12 PLAYERS.

EASY PHOTON CLOUD PLAYER ROUND HOSTING WITH OPTIONS LIKE PASSWORD, FREINDS, PING LIMIT, QUICK MATCH, GAME MODES, PLAYERS LIMIT, MUCH MORE.

MENU = ESC.
PLAYER SCORE = TAB.

DRIVE MOVEMENT = ARROW KEYS.
TURRET MOVEMENT = MOUSE
ZOOM IN OUT = MOUSE WHEEL.
AIM = RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON.
SWAP SHELL TYPE ARMOUR PIERCE OR HIGH EXPLOSIVE = V
DRIVER CAMERA CHANGE = F
FIRE BUTTON = LEFT MOUSE
VOTE = F1 YES, F2 NO.
MESSAGE TEXT ENTER T FOR CHAT, Y FOR TEAM.

data.short_description: Multiplayer ww2 tanks fps and 3d shooter game, not pay to win.10 ww2 tanks, 2 to 12 players with hassle free multiplayer hosting on cloud network , 3 game modes and 7 ww2 maps.Physics tracks and hit point damage system with AP and HE shells.Not pay to win with expencive ammo unlike some other tank game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 ghz quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ONBOARD "intel(r) hd graphics 630"
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Most or onboard
  • Additional Notes: Not tested on win7 or win8
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 ghz quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: "NVIDIA GTX 460" "AMD RX 570" "NVIDIA GTX 970"
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Most or onboard
  • Additional Notes: Frame rate capped at 60fps

data.legal_notice:
This game has photon global cloud multiplayer networks for English speaking countrys like Australian commonwealth and united states of America, must be over 13 years of age.
Mods are not supported and manipulative hackers and cheats are at risk.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains tank warfare of tanks shooting each other with explosions.
